'''1.8.1-pre3''' is the third pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.8.1]], released on October 23, 2014, which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20141024233331/https://mojang.com/2014/10/minecraft-1-8-1-pre-release-1/|title=Minecraft 1.8.1 Pre-release 3|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref>

== Changes ==
* Villagers keep their name when zombified into a zombie villager.
